\dNow then Yukari, look after things while we're\naway, would you?\d%K%P
\dWhat? I don't like the sound of that!\d%K%P
\dI refuse! I absolutely do not consent to this!\d%K%P
Yukari was doing everything in her power to object.%K%P
\dAhaha, the way you are now, you don't exactly\nhave much choice.\d%K%P
By the time I had come down to breakfast, Yukari\nwas already tightly bound by Kaede's ropes.%K%P
\dThis is unfair! Untie me right this instant!\d%K%P
\dIf you don't... Eheheh, nothing will be able to\nstop my Tatari!\d%K%P
As if adding credence to her threats black clouds\nrose around her.%K%P
\dYou never learn, do you? Do you even know why\nwe're doing this?\d%K%P
\dI can't say I do.\d%K%P
\dBecause you tried to cozy up to Akira last night!\d%K%P
\dI did not. I just did what any wife would do.\d%K%P
\dA wife needs to attend to her husband. It is her\nduty!\d%K%P
\dSo that's what all this is about.\d%K%P
I'd slept through it all and hadn't noticed.%K%P
Who would have thought all this had gone on...?%K%P
\dAkira here has to go to a meeting about Kamimori\nShrine's annual fall festival out at the main\nshrine.\d%K%P
\dSo we'll need you to look after the place while\nwe're gone.\d%K%P
\dHow am I supposed to do that like this?\d%K%P
\dFine, I'll cut you loose.\d%K%P
\dI'm not staying here, though! My husband needs his\nwife!\d%K%P
\dIf you really think you can leave me behind,\nyou've got another thing coming.\d%K%P
\dEhehehe!\d%K%P
It was never a good sign when she laughed like\nthat.%K%P
Her Jinriki oozed out from within, so much so that\neven Kaede was taken aback.%K%P
\dKaede! The bean sprouts you were growing are\nstarting to droop!\d%K%P
\dI guess she is too much, even for plants.\d%K%P
\dAll right Kaede, that's enough.\d%K%P
\dC'mon, let's all settle down.\d%K%P
I took Yukari, in her frightening mental state, and\ndrew her close to me.%K%P
\dAh... Akira? You'd treat me with such outward\naffection...?\d%K%P
\dAre you okay, Yukari?\d%K%P
\dY-Yes, thanks to you. You brought me back to my\nsenses.\d%K%P
\dWe won't leave you behind, don't worry. You're\ncoming with us.\d%K%P
\dOh Akira!\d%K%P
\dOh you're just so close, I could lick that neck of\nyours...\d%K%P
\dHey, cut that out.\d%K%P
\dOkay, I'll bite it then!\d%K%P
Not settling down a bit, she stopped licking me and\nstarted giving me love bites.%K%P
A complete turnabout from before, she was now\nmore like a cute kitten than a lion.%K%P
\dYou spoil her...\d%K%P
\dWell, you did take things a bit far. Let her have\nher fun.\d%K%P
\dFine. Let's all go together.\d%K%P
The main shrine was still in the same city as our\nbranch, but it was quite far away.%K%P
We had to take a bus up over the mountains and\nhead down about an hour on the far side to get\ninto town.%K%P
And the bus stop itself was all the way out at the\nrear temple.%K%P
\dNo one can get between us now!\d%K%P
The seats on the bus were in pairs so Yukari and I\nsat together.%K%P
\dI wish we could just head off together like\nthis...somewhere far away.\d%K%P
\dMaybe some other time. I've got a meeting today.\d%K%P
\dI know. I was just thinking out loud.\d%K%P
\dBut we'll definitely have to go on a honeymoon\nsomeday!\d%K%P
I could tell she was getting excited at the thought\nby how she latched on to me.%K%P
She seemed pleased to have me to herself.%K%P
\dWhy did we have to decide this with rock, paper,\nscissors?\d%K%P
\dYou're pretty bad at it, huh...\d%K%P
\dYou could have at least won and spared us all\nthis.\d%K%P
We had decided our seats fair and square with rock,\npaper, scissors.%K%P
\dHey now don't go getting all cozy. We're here too,\nyou know!\d%K%P
\dDid you hear something? I couldn't make it out\nover the engine.\d%K%P
Yukari was completely ignoring the others.%K%P
She wanted to pretend we were here without them.%K%P
\dOh, how wonderful... Now if only the bus could\njust break down or something, we could spend so\nmuch time together.\d%K%P
\dDon't even joke about that.\d%K%P
\dThey do say such experiences bring people closer.\d%K%P
\dEheheh!\d%K%P
I'm not sure she realized what she was wishing on\nus.%K%P
I could have handled her just talking about it, but\nthe black clouds rising up around her hands had me\nworried.%K%P
\dHey, you wanna relax a little?\d%K%P
I took her hands and held back the Tatari.%K%P
If I hadn't, the bus might have been in trouble.%K%P
\dDestruction of property is against the law, you\nknow.\d%K%P
\dDon't worry. No one will dare testify against me.\d%K%P
\dI'll keep you quiet with a sweet kiss, Akira. You\njust wait!\d%K%P
\dI'd prefer you just keep the bus in one piece.\d%K%P
\dHehehe, that all depends on you. Can you hold my\nTatari back?\d%K%P
She was hugging my arm.%K%P
She was holding on so tight, it felt like my arm\nmight fall off.%K%P
\dIf you want to kiss me, all you need to do is say.\nYour faithful wife is always waiting for you.\d%K%P
\dGrrr...that Yukari. No amount of rock, paper,\nscissors gives her that privilege...\d%K%P
\dShe's squishing those boobs right into him to try\nand get his attention.\d%K%P
\dI guess letting him grab mine wasn't enough...\d%K%P
Now it was Kaede's turn to start overthinking.%K%P
\dListen to you all, nothing but boobs on your\nminds. Wait until they feel my malice...\d%K%P
\dMay their breasts wither! May their breasts\nwither! May their breasts wither...!\d%K%P
\dWhat's this? Some sort of curse?!\d%K%P
\dOh Akira! Save me!\d%K%P
\dShoot, that's not how this was supposed to work.\nIt just fanned the flames!\d%K%P
The more they tried to stop her, the more Yukari\ndrew close.%K%P
There was no stopping her now.%K%P
\dAaah, nothing beats this feeling...\d%K%P
\dYour Sakimitama is just so wonderfully warm...\d%K%P
